item.title: Hunger Games' Young Snow Actor Reveals His Casting Status For The Upcoming Haymitch Prequel
item.description: After playing Coriolanus Snow in The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes, Tom Blyth addresses his potential return in the new Hunger Games prequel.

item.title: “It’s Not The Same”: Michelle Yeoh Talks Avatar 4 As Her Latest Sci-Fi Action Movie Releases
item.description: Exclusive: Acclaimed actor Michelle Yeoh compares her experience working on James Cameron's Avatar movies to the long-awaited Star Trek: Section 31.

item.title: Oscars 2025 Nominations: 12 Biggest Surprises & Snubs
item.description: The Oscars nominations have arrived, and there were a few surprises that most would not have predicted, including I’m Still Here for Best Picture.
